channel.description: An aggregated feed of Microsoft blogs

item.title: Microsoft Purview data catalog now supports tags
item.description:
We are announcing the tags feature in Microsoft Purview Data Catalog. Tags are a form of metadata that can be added to assets in order to label or categorize them. Similar to social media hashtags, tags are free-text words that can be used to associate multiple pieces of information with a single asset. Users can utilize tags to easily locate and retrieve data assets as needed, providing valuable context for anyone who needs to access them. Examples of tags include project names, cost centers, or other relevant keywords that help to organize and differentiate data assets.
Data stewards can n...
